short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Pomodoro timer Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple pomodoro timer chrome extension for boosting your productivity. 

Features :-
- a simple pomodoro timer 
- an additional rest timer (after the Pomodoro timer stops running)
- shows popup at the end of each timer

The extension uses the concept of minimalism at its core from ui to functionality. Only the most necessary features are provided by us and nothing else. 

Do try it out for a better experience
